	(function( Modernizr){

			ie = /MSIE|Trident/ig,
			android = /Android/ig,
			ua  = navigator.userAgent;

		Modernizr.addTest("mobile", function(){
			return mob.test( ua ) && Modernizr.mq("only screen and (min-width: 320px) and (max-width: 639px)");
		});

		Modernizr.addTest("tablet", function(){
			return mob.test( ua ) && ! Modernizr.mobile;
		});

		Modernizr.addTest("ie", function(){
			return ie.test( ua );
		});

			return ios.test( ua );
		});

		Modernizr.addTest("android", function() {
			return android.test( ua );

			var url = '';
			var correlator = Date.now();

			// Check for URL parameters
	    var queryParameters = window.location.search.substring(1);

	    if (queryParameters.length) {

	      // Explode query parameter string
	      queryParameters = queryParameters.split('&');

	      // Initialise base variables
	      var params = {},
	      token = 'n/a';

	      // Parse URL parameters and store in params variable
	      for (var i = 0; i < queryParameters.length; i++) {
	        var pair = queryParameters[i].split('=');

	        if (typeof params[pair[0]] === 'undefined') {
	          params[pair[0]] = pair[1];
	        } else if (typeof params[pair[0]] === 'string') {
	          var arr = [params[pair[0]], pair[1]];
	          params[pair[0]] = arr;
	        } else {
	          params[pair[0]].push(pair[1]);
	        }
	      }

	      // Check for token parameter
	      for (var i in params) {
	        switch (i) {
	          case 'token':
	            token = (typeof(params[i]) !== 'undefined') ? params[i] : '';
	            break;

	          default:
	        }
	      }

</a>

</a>

<a
class="landing-feed--story-title link link-txt" href="/tv/the-missing/news/a837204/the-missing-season-3-cast-spin-off/">
The Missing could get a spin-off rather than a series 3
</a>
<a
class="landing-feed--story-truncated-title link link-txt" href="/tv/the-missing/news/a837204/the-missing-season-3-cast-spin-off/">
The Missing could get a spin-off rather than a series 3
</a><div
class="landing-feed--story-abstract">
<span
class="abstract-text">"We'd like to revisit the tone and the feel of that world."</span></div><div

class="story-image--inner">

<a
class="landing-feed--story-title link link-txt" href="/tv/the-flash/news/a837215/the-flash-season-4-killer-frost-tom-felton-danielle-panabaker/">
The Flash star addresses Tom Felton's season 4 absence
</a>
<a
class="landing-feed--story-truncated-title link link-txt" href="/tv/the-flash/news/a837215/the-flash-season-4-killer-frost-tom-felton-danielle-panabaker/">
The Flash star addresses Tom Felton's season 4 absence
</a><div
class="landing-feed--story-abstract">
<span
class="abstract-text">"It's a loss for the show, and for Team Flash."</span></div><div
class="landing-feed--story-section-share "><div
class="landing-feed--story-shares">
<i
class="icon icon-share"></i>
<span
class="landing-feed--story-shares-text">Share</span><div
class="share landing-share share-bar"><div
class="share-module"><ul
class="share-module--buttons"><li
class="share-module--button-wrap share-module--button-wrap-facebook "><div
class="share-button share-button--facebook "

</a>

</a><div

class=" lazy-image   swap-image     "

class="abstract-text">"It's a great classic hero's story."</span></div></div></div></div></div><div

class="landing-feed-contextual-info"></div>
</a><div

class="landing-feed--story"><div
class="landing-feed--story-inner"><div
class="landing-feed--story-container" data-uid="article.837229"><div
class="landing-feed--story-image">
<a
href="/soaps/hollyoaks/news/a837229/hollyoaks-viewers-who-killed-amy-reveal-harry-thompson-reactions/" class="link story-image--link"><div
class="story-image--inner">

</a></div></li></ul></div></div></div></div><a

<span
class="content-flags--container">Exclusive</span>
Elton John's Kingsman role is "significant"
</a>
<a
class="landing-feed--story-truncated-title link link-txt" href="/movies/kingsman/news/a836941/elton-john-significant-hilarious-role-kingsman-the-golden-circle/">
<span
class="content-flags--container">Exclusive</span>
Elton John's Kingsman role is "significant"
</a><div

class="story-image--inner">
<img

class="share-module--button-wrap share-module--button-wrap-facebook "><div
class="share-button share-button--facebook "
